page.title: 08MY HOUSE - AN OLD ONE.
page.content: My house was built in 1748. It has pantiles on the roof not slate,and is built by a farmer who kept horses and cows. It had 11 rooms when it was built but will have 14 when we finish it. They kept it warm by open coal fires, but we are having central heating which burns oil. It is two storeys high at the front but is single storey at the back. There is a long garden at the back with old fruit trees at the bottom. The house has been altered many times in the last 237 years. Danielle Lucas.
